name: Jumping Jacks
phases: 1. Jump feet out, arms overhead. 2. Jump feet in, arms to side.
benefits: Raises heart rate, warms up shoulder joints, improves coordination.
mistakes: Knees caving in, not touching hands overhead, landing flat-footed.
regress_progress: Regression: Step jacks (no jump). Progression: Star jumps.
best_use: Start of workout to raise body temperature.

name: Burpees
phases: 1. Squat to floor. 2. Jump back to plank. 3. Pushup. 4. Jump forward. 5. Vertical Jump.
benefits: Maximal calorie burn, functional strength, cardiovascular endurance.
mistakes: Arching back in plank, skipping the jump, landing stiff-legged.
regress_progress: Regression: Step back burpee (no pushup). Progression: Burpee box jump.
best_use: Peak intensity phase for max heart rate.

name: Mountain Climbers
muscles: Abs, Hip Flexors, Shoulders, Serratus Anterior
phases: 1. High plank position. 2. Drive one knee to chest. 3. Switch rapidly.
benefits: Core stability, hip mobility, heart rate spike.
mistakes: Hips bouncing too high, hands too far forward, holding breath.
regress_progress: Regression: Slow climbers. Progression: Cross-body climbers.

name: High Knees
phases: 1. Run in place. 2. Drive knees above waist level. 3. Pump arms.
benefits: Improves running form, explosive hip power, cardio.
mistakes: Leaning back, knees not high enough, slow tempo.
regress_progress: Regression: High knee march. Progression: High knees with resistance band.

name: Squat Jumps
phases: 1. Squat down. 2. Explode up vertically. 3. Soft landing into next squat.
benefits: Vertical leap, explosive power, leg hypertrophy.
mistakes: Landing with stiff legs, knees caving in, not using arms.
regress_progress: Regression: Bodyweight squats. Progression: Weighted vest squat jumps.

name: Pushups
phases: 1. High plank. 2. Lower chest to floor (eccentric). 3. Press up (concentric).
benefits: Upper body pushing strength, core stability.
mistakes: Flared elbows, sagging hips, head dropping.
regress_progress: Regression: Knee pushups / Incline pushups. Progression: Diamond pushups.

name: Plank
phases: 1. Forearms on ground. 2. Body in straight line. 3. Hold tension.
mistakes: Hips sagging, butt too high, holding breath.
regress_progress: Regression: Knee plank. Progression: Weighted plank / Long lever plank.

name: Lunges (Forward)
phases: 1. Step forward. 2. Lower back knee toward floor. 3. Push back to start.
benefits: Unilateral leg strength, balance, hip mobility.
mistakes: Front knee past toes (excessively), banging back knee on floor.
regress_progress: Regression: Reverse lunges. Progression: Jumping lunges.

name: Lunge Jumps
phases: 1. Start in lunge. 2. Jump and switch legs in air. 3. Land in opposite lunge.
benefits: Explosive unilateral power, coordination, high calorie burn.
mistakes: Hard landing, hitting knee on floor, torso leaning forward.
regress_progress: Regression: Alternating reverse lunges. Progression: Weighted lunge jumps.

name: Plank Jacks
phases: 1. High plank position. 2. Jump feet out wide. 3. Jump feet back in.
benefits: Elevated heart rate while maintaining core tension.
mistakes: Hips bouncing up and down, shoulders drifting behind wrists.
regress_progress: Regression: Plank tap-outs. Progression: Banded plank jacks.

name: Russian Twists
phases: 1. Seated V position. 2. Rotate torso left. 3. Rotate torso right.
mistakes: Rounding the back, moving only arms (not torso), feet touching floor (if advanced).
regress_progress: Regression: Feet on floor. Progression: Weighted Russian twist.

name: Bicycle Crunches
phases: 1. Supine position. 2. Elbow to opposite knee. 3. Extend other leg.
benefits: One of the most effective exercises for rectus abdominis activation.
mistakes: Pulling on neck, rushing tempo, not fully extending leg.
regress_progress: Regression: Dead bug. Progression: Straight leg bicycle.

name: Glute Bridges
phases: 1. Lie on back, knees bent. 2. Drive hips up. 3. Squeeze glutes at top.
mistakes: Hyperextending lower back, pushing through toes instead of heels.
regress_progress: Regression: Hold at top only. Progression: Single leg glute bridge.

name: Inchworm
phases: 1. Standing. 2. Hinge and walk hands out to plank. 3. Walk hands back to feet.
mistakes: Sagging hips in plank, bending knees too much.
regress_progress: Regression: Walk out only to knees. Progression: Add pushup at bottom.

name: Arm Circles
phases: 1. Arms extended to side. 2. Rotate in small circles. 3. Gradually increase size.
benefits: Warms up shoulder synovial fluid, improves range of motion.
regress_progress: N/A

name: Torso Twists
phases: 1. Standing feet wide. 2. Rotate torso side to side freely.
benefits: Loosens up the spine and core musculature.
regress_progress: N/A

name: Butt Kicks
phases: 1. Jog in place. 2. Bring heels to glutes.
mistakes: Knees driving forward (keep them pointing down).
regress_progress: Regression: Walking butt kicks. Progression: High speed butt kicks.

name: Skater Jumps
phases: 1. Jump laterally to one foot. 2. Cross other leg behind. 3. Explode back.
mistakes: Twisting knee, touching back foot to ground (try to keep elevated).
regress_progress: Regression: Curtsy lunge. Progression: Speed skaters (touch floor).

name: Lateral Lunges
phases: 1. Step wide to side. 2. Push hips back and bend one knee. 3. Keep other leg straight.
mistakes: Bending both knees, heel lifting off floor.
regress_progress: Regression: Side step squats. Progression: Cossack squats.

name: Tricep Dips (Floor/Chair)
phases: 1. Hands on bench/floor behind you. 2. Lower hips/bend elbows. 3. Push up.
mistakes: Shrugging shoulders, elbows flaring out wide.
regress_progress: Regression: Bent knees. Progression: Straight legs / Weighted lap.

name: Superman
phases: 1. Lie prone (face down). 2. Lift arms and legs simultaneously. 3. Hold.
mistakes: Jerking motion, looking up too high (strain neck).
regress_progress: Regression: Lift opposite arm/leg. Progression: W-raises.

name: Bird Dog
phases: 1. Tabletop position. 2. Extend opposite arm and leg. 3. Hold level.
benefits: Teaches spinal stability and cross-body coordination.
mistakes: Arching back, hips tilting to one side.
regress_progress: Regression: Lift only arm or leg. Progression: Knee to elbow crunch.

name: Dead Bug
phases: 1. Lie on back, arms/legs up. 2. Lower opposite arm/leg. 3. Keep low back pressed down.
benefits: Anti-extension core strength, safe for lower back.
mistakes: Lower back arching off floor (Critical error).
regress_progress: Regression: Bent knees. Progression: Straight legs.

name: Hollow Body Hold
phases: 1. Lie on back. 2. Lift shoulders and legs. 3. Press low back into floor.
benefits: Gymnastic core strength, total anterior tension.
mistakes: Back arching, chin tucking too hard.
regress_progress: Regression: Tuck hold. Progression: Hollow rocks.

name: Wall Sit
phases: 1. Back against wall. 2. Slide down to 90 degree knee bend. 3. Hold.
mistakes: Hands on knees (cheat), hips above knees.
regress_progress: Regression: High squat hold. Progression: Single leg wall sit.

name: Calf Raises
phases: 1. Stand tall. 2. Push through toes to raise heels. 3. Lower slowly.
regress_progress: Regression: Seated. Progression: Single leg calf raise.

name: Reverse Lunges
phases: 1. Step back. 2. Lower knee. 3. Drive through front heel to stand.
benefits: More glute dominant than forward lunge, safer on knees.
mistakes: Leaning too far back, not stepping back far enough.
regress_progress: Regression: Assisted lunge. Progression: Deficit reverse lunge.

name: Curtsy Lunges
phases: 1. Step foot back and across behind other leg. 2. Lunge down.
mistakes: Hips rotating too much, knee torque.
regress_progress: Regression: Step only. Progression: Weighted.

name: Sumo Squats
phases: 1. Wide stance, toes out. 2. Squat down vertically. 3. Squeeze glutes up.
benefits: Inner thigh strength, different quad stimulus.
mistakes: Knees caving in (must track over toes).
regress_progress: Regression: Regular squat. Progression: Sumo pulse.

name: Pike Pushups
phases: 1. Downward dog position. 2. Bend elbows to lower head to floor. 3. Push back.
benefits: Vertical pushing strength (similar to overhead press).
mistakes: Elbows flaring too wide, hips dropping.
regress_progress: Regression: Hold pike. Progression: Feet elevated pike pushup.

name: Diamond Pushups
phases: 1. Hands form diamond shape under chest. 2. Pushup mechanics.
mistakes: Hands too high (should be under sternum).
regress_progress: Regression: Knees diamond. Progression: Feet elevated.

name: Wide Pushups
phases: 1. Hands wider than shoulders. 2. Lower chest. 3. Press.
benefits: Focuses on chest stretch and activation.
regress_progress: Regression: Knees. Progression: Archer pushups.

name: Spiderman Pushups
phases: 1. Pushup. 2. Bring same-side knee to elbow at bottom.
benefits: Combines push strength with core stability.
regress_progress: Regression: Spiderman plank. Progression: Weighted.

name: Commando Planks
phases: 1. Low plank. 2. Push up to high plank one hand at a time. 3. Lower back down.
mistakes: Hips rocking side to side (fight this!).
regress_progress: Regression: Knees. Progression: Faster tempo.

name: Shoulder Taps
phases: 1. High plank. 2. Tap opposite shoulder. 3. Minimal body movement.
regress_progress: Regression: Knees. Progression: Feet closer together (harder).

name: Leg Raises
phases: 1. Lie on back. 2. Lift straight legs to 90 degrees. 3. Lower slowly.
mistakes: Arching lower back on the way down.
regress_progress: Regression: Knee tucks. Progression: Dragon flags.

name: Flutter Kicks
phases: 1. Lie on back, legs slightly off floor. 2. Kick small rapid kicks.
benefits: Endurance for hip flexors and lower abs.
mistakes: Kicking too high or bending knees.
regress_progress: Regression: Hands under butt. Progression: Hollow body flutters.

name: V-Ups
phases: 1. Lie flat. 2. Snap torso and legs up to touch toes. 3. Lower.
regress_progress: Regression: Tuck ups. Progression: Weighted V-ups.

name: Sit-ups
phases: 1. Lie back, knees bent. 2. Curl spine up to knees. 3. Lower.
regress_progress: Regression: Crunches. Progression: Weighted sit-ups.

name: Star Jumps
phases: 1. Crouch down. 2. Explode into X shape in air. 3. Land soft.
regress_progress: Regression: Jumping jacks. Progression: Tuck star jumps.

name: Broad Jumps
phases: 1. Load hips back. 2. Jump forward for distance. 3. Land soft.
regress_progress: Regression: Step squats. Progression: Continuous broad jumps.

name: Tuck Jumps
phases: 1. Stand tall. 2. Jump and pull knees to chest. 3. Land immediately.
regress_progress: Regression: High knees. Progression: Double tucks.

name: Box Jumps (or Step Jumps)
phases: 1. Face box/step. 2. Explode up onto surface. 3. Stand tall.
benefits: Explosive power without high impact landing (if stepping down).
mistakes: Jumping off the box (step down instead to save knees).
regress_progress: Regression: Step ups. Progression: Higher box.

name: Lateral Shuffles
phases: 1. Athletic stance. 2. Shuffle side to side quickly.
mistakes: Crossing feet (don't trip), standing too tall.
regress_progress: Regression: Side step. Progression: Banded shuffle.

name: Fast Feet
phases: 1. Athletic stance. 2. Run in place as fast as possible (low knees).
mistakes: Slow tempo, heels touching ground (stay on toes).
regress_progress: N/A

name: Froggers
phases: 1. Plank. 2. Jump feet outside hands (squat). 3. Jump back to plank.
regress_progress: Regression: Step feet. Progression: Add jump at top.

name: Bear Crawl
phases: 1. Tabletop, knees hovering. 2. Crawl forward (opposite arm/leg).
mistakes: Hips piking up high (keep back flat).
regress_progress: Regression: Knees on floor crawl. Progression: Backward/Lateral crawl.

name: Crab Walk
phases: 1. Reverse tabletop. 2. Walk backwards/forwards.
regress_progress: Regression: Static hold. Progression: Crab toe touches.

name: Seal Jacks
phases: 1. Start feet together, arms forward. 2. Jump wide, open arms wide.
regress_progress: Regression: Step jacks.

name: Heisman Shuffle
phases: 1. Step, Step, Knee Drive (Hold). 2. Repeat other side.
regress_progress: N/A

name: Cat-Cow
phases: 1. Tabletop. 2. Inhale/Arch back (Cow). 3. Exhale/Round back (Cat).
regress_progress: N/A

name: Child's Pose
phases: 1. Kneel. 2. Sit back on heels. 3. Reach arms forward.
regress_progress: N/A

name: Cobra Stretch
phases: 1. Prone position. 2. Push torso up with hands. 3. Look up.
regress_progress: Regression: Baby cobra.

name: Downward Dog
phases: 1. Plank. 2. Push hips high/back. 3. Drive heels to floor.
regress_progress: N/A

name: Pigeon Pose
phases: 1. One leg forward bent at 90 deg. 2. Back leg straight. 3. Lean forward.
regress_progress: Regression: Figure 4 on back.

name: Butterfly Stretch
phases: 1. Seated, soles of feet together. 2. Press knees down gently.
regress_progress: N/A

name: Slow Walk
phases: 1. Walk slowly. 2. Breathe deeply.
benefits: Flushes lactic acid, lowers heart rate.
regress_progress: N/A

name: Hamstring Stretch
phases: 1. Standing or seated. 2. Reach for toes with straight legs.
regress_progress: N/A

name: Quad Stretch
phases: 1. Standing. 2. Pull heel to glute. 3. Keep knees together.
regress_progress: N/A

name: Single Leg Deadlift
phases: 1. Stand on one leg. 2. Hinge at hip, leg goes back. 3. Return.
regress_progress: Regression: Kickstand RDL.

name: Good Mornings
phases: 1. Hands behind head. 2. Hinge at hips (butt back). 3. Squeeze up.
regress_progress: N/A

name: Donkey Kicks
phases: 1. Tabletop. 2. Kick one heel to ceiling. 3. Lower.
regress_progress: N/A

name: Fire Hydrants
phases: 1. Tabletop. 2. Lift knee to side like a dog. 3. Lower.
regress_progress: N/A

name: Side Plank
phases: 1. Elbow on ground. 2. Lift hips. 3. Hold straight line.
regress_progress: Regression: Knee down.

name: Pulse Squats
phases: 1. Squat down. 2. Pulse up and down slightly at bottom.
regress_progress: N/A

name: Ankle Rolls
phases: 1. Lift foot. 2. Rotate ankle in circles.
regress_progress: N/A

name: Wrist Rotations
phases: 1. Interlace fingers. 2. Roll wrists.
regress_progress: N/A

name: Neck Tilts
phases: 1. Tilt ear to shoulder. 2. Hold gently.
regress_progress: N/A

name: World's Greatest Stretch
phases: 1. Lunge forward. 2. Inside elbow to floor. 3. Rotate arm up.
regress_progress: N/A

name: Reverse Snow Angels
phases: 1. Prone. 2. Lift arms, swim them overhead and back.
regress_progress: N/A

name: Scissor Kicks
phases: 1. Lie back. 2. Cross legs over/under repeatedly.
regress_progress: N/A

name: Prayer Stretch
phases: 1. Kneel, elbows on bench/chair. 2. Drop head through arms.
regress_progress: N/A

name: Shin Box Switch
phases: 1. Sit with knees at 90/90. 2. Rotate hips to switch sides.
mistakes: Using hands too much (try no hands).
regress_progress: N/A

name: Clamshells
phases: 1. Side lying, knees bent. 2. Open top knee like clam.
regress_progress: N/A

name: Frog Pumps
phases: 1. Glute bridge position but soles of feet together. 2. Pump hips.
regress_progress: N/A

name: Corpse Pose
phases: 1. Lie flat. 2. Palms up. 3. Close eyes and breathe.
regress_progress: N/A
